laboratory_examinations.findings: Increased C-reactive protein (PCR) 14 mg/l, D-dimer 721 ng/ml, IgE levels 772 KU/l.

0.5-cm increase in mid-forearm perimeter, intense pruritus, increased local temperature, localized hives beginning 3 minutes after stimulus cessation, lasting 20 minutes, and an oedematous plaque at the area where the vibration was maximum, observable 5 hours later.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Delayed pressure urticaria challenge with suspended weight method
